title: Introduction to Web Development

instructor.name: Prof. Shrikant K.
instructor.bio: Prof. Shrikant K. is a highly experienced web development expert with a passion for teaching. He has been actively involved in various web development projects and has mentored numerous students in their journey to become proficient developers.

description: Learn the basics of web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

modules.title: HTML Basics
modules.description: In this module, you will learn the fundamentals of HTML, including tags, elements, and basic page structure.

modules.title: HTML Forms
modules.description: Learn how to create forms in HTML to collect user inputs and process them.

modules.title: Assignment
modules.description: Learn how to create forms in HTML to collect user inputs and process them.

modules.title: Quiz
modules.description: Learn how to create forms in HTML to collect user inputs and process them.

modules.title: CSS Basics
modules.description: Discover the fundamentals of CSS and how to apply styles to HTML elements.

modules.title: CSS Layout
modules.description: Learn how to create different layouts using CSS, including positioning and responsive design.

modules.title: Introduction to JavaScript
modules.description: Get started with JavaScript and learn about variables, data types, and basic programming concepts.

modules.title: DOM Manipulation
modules.description: Explore how to manipulate the Document Object Model (DOM) using JavaScript to create interactive web pages.

modules.title: JavaScript Functions
modules.description: Learn about functions in JavaScript and how to use them to organize your code.

modules.title: JavaScript Events
modules.description: Discover how to handle user events in JavaScript and create dynamic web interactions.

modules.title: Introduction to Bootstrap
modules.description: Get an introduction to Bootstrap framework for building responsive and visually appealing web applications.

modules.title: Introduction to Frontend Frameworks
modules.description: Learn about popular frontend frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue.js.

modules.title: Final Project
modules.description: Work on your final project to showcase what you have learned throughout the course.
